channel.title: [317] Npc health
channel.description:
yes, i know how to code a 317, it's just when i spawn an npc the hp is 0 i tryed editing the npchandler thing.
could someone give me a good npchandler or what ever it is most base client's dont work. so dont reccomend one to me unless it's good.

item.title: [317] Npc health
item.dc:creator: @killerj012 killerj012
item.description:
@killerj012 wrote:

You don’t need to edit the npchandler, it’s called the ‘npc.cfg.’

Read full topic
